page.title: 11Running A Marathon
page.content: Each year a marathon is held in London. People from all over the world take part. The people have to run 26 miles 385 yards. The people give the money to charity. Oakmere Schools Headmaster took part and raised 1000 pounds it helped to buy a mini-bus for the school. Oakmere School organised a micro-marathon in which St.Giles and Wroxham Schools took part. The third and fourth years had to run round the football pitch then the first and second years started. When I ran round the field I nearly fell over. When I was at the tree I had a rest and then I was off again. As I reached the cricket nets I was very tired I felt like dropping out because I had pains and stitches. My muscles were really straining but as I was coming to the finish everyone was cheering. Everyone who finished got a certificate.
